resources.string: \t\t\t\tHello, welcome to my Flickr photo viewing app. This application was created as part of the hiring process for Bottle Rocket in Dallas, TX. There are two ways to browse through the images. First,you can use your finger to swipe left or right to move the images. Secondly, there are two buttons on the bottom of the screen that will also navigate throught these photos.

Southern Methodist University
 Jwrowland@smu.edu
 817-899-8965 (cell)
 3140 Dyer St SMU #2378
 Dallas, Texas 75275

\t\t\t\tI am a computer science major at Southern Methodist University and I have wanted to be a programmer for as long as I can remember. I love the challenge provided to me from a great problem to solve. Take this application for example. Before I had little to none experience working on android devices. Im glad to say, it has been a while since I have this much fun developing an applicaiton, especially getting to learn the quirks surrounding Android OS. Luckly I had a vast background in java programming which helped me greatly in this project. Anyways, back to me. Im currently a sophtmore planning on graduating during the spring of 2019, but already egear to join the work force over the summer. Especially if its new and challenging. I appreciate the tiem you have taken to both read about me and partake in my application. Hopefully as I learn more, I can improve the visual quality of it, but I can tell you the inner workings are my favorite part. Feel free to contact me at any time. \n \n Thank you all.
